definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Depressants are alcohol, barbiturates and sedatives.
sentences.chinese: 抑制藥有酒精，巴比妥酸鹽和鎮靜劑。

sentences.english: This inhibited the process of translation, producing a homogeneous population of empty ribosomes.
sentences.chinese: 這抑制了翻譯的過程，產生了一個均勻的核糖空缺。

sentences.english: Conclusions Osteoclast-mediated bone resorption was inhibited by the bisphosphonate administration.
sentences.chinese: 結論雙膦酸鹽對破骨細胞性骨吸收有明顯的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Filtrates produced from antagonistic bacteria were also inhibitory to growth of V. dahliae.
sentences.chinese: 這些拮抗菌的培養濾液也能抑制棉花黃萎菌的生長。

sentences.english: Baclofen was more effective in inhibiting field potentials than GABA.
sentences.chinese: 繼而，左旋巴氯芬抑制場電位作用強於GABA。

sentences.english: The financial restraint in rural areas is one of the bottlenecked factors in current new rural construction.
sentences.chinese: 農村金融抑制是當前新農村建設問題的瓶頸因素之一。

sentences.english: This inhibiting effect was due chiefly to the concentration of combined nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 化合態氮的抑制作用與濃度密切相關。

sentences.english: The addition of steam inhibits the production of hydrogen cyanide.
sentences.chinese: 水蒸氣的加入會抑制氰化氫的產率。

sentences.english: Thus a comb notch filter based new interference reduction method is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 文中提出了一種梳狀陷波器干擾抑制新方法。

sentences.english: Studies clearly show that rifampin decreases the effectiveness of birth control pills in preventing ovulation.
sentences.chinese: 研究清楚顯示，利福平會降低避孕藥抑制排卵的效力。

sentences.english: Furthermore, some methods to restrain or decrease the two-side direction burr in grinding-hardening machining are developed.
sentences.chinese: 同時，給出了若干抑制或減少兩側方向毛刺的方法。

sentences.english: The circuit can restrain odd order harmonic distortion and common model disturbing signal.
sentences.chinese: 該電路具有對偶次諧波及共模干擾信號具有抑制作用。

sentences.english: The oral drug is the first in an HIV drug class called integrase inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 這種新型的口服抗艾滋病毒藥物屬於整合酶抑制劑。

sentences.english: The TP53 tumor suppressor gene is involved in a multiple cellular processes.
sentences.chinese: TP53腫瘤抑制基因參與了多種細胞內過程。

sentences.english: The result showed that nanoscale silver has evidently inhibitory effects on testing bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，納米銀對供試菌種有較爲明顯的抑制作用。

definition: to check/to contain/to hold back/to keep within limits/to constrain/to restrain
to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to provoke/to irritate/to upset/to stimulate/to excite/irritant
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
to prevent/to guard against/to take precautions
to defer/to postpone/to put off/to retard/to slow sth down
to adjust/to regulate/to harmonize/to reconcile (accountancy etc)
